creator: Whisper Arts
descriptionHtml:
If you're like most mothers, you'll gain a sense of security in tracking your newborn's feeding and diapers. Erby will help you make sure your baby is getting enough breast milk, know which breast to start the next feeding on, and record any pumpings or supplemental feedings.

All in one app for baby & nursing mother! Separate profile for mom and baby.

Erby is a breastfeeding mom 's simple food, beverage, medicine, and supplement log to help identify allergy triggers on an infant.

So, if you think your infant eczema, wheezing, diarrhea, or any of the enumerated illnesses is allergy - related, grab this food diary and start logging now!

Log in breastfeeding or bottle feeding, diaper changes, sleep patterns, vaccination, and more all to help track a baby's development and keep the baby on a schedule.

Erby allows you to turn off features you don't use. So if you only want to track stash or only want to track feeding you can do that! Just add the useful button on a widget.

You can:
- easily record breastfeeding by one click
- track pumping by each breast or by both, if you, expressing two breasts at one time
- track stash - always be sure that you have enough frozen milk
- fix night sleep and nap to figure out your baby sleep patterns
- record bottle feeding: formula, pumped milk, water, whatever
- fix urination (with a volume if needed) and defecation separately
- fixing diaper changing, you will always know how many diapers were changed per day
- monitor weight gain and height
- record baths and walks, play, massage
- track teething
- fix solid food, add details to track babies reaction
- track symptoms and temperature
- add vitamins or medicines and reactions
- write down thoughts on motherhood, memories, milestones, or questions and concerns to share with the baby's doctor. Erby is great for pediatrician visits.

More than a log book! Erby can become a keepsake of your first precious months with your baby.

Logging and tracking activity of several babies. Supports twins!

Erby was created to help even the most sleep - deprived mothers monitor the baby's progress by recording a baby's daily activity in this easy to use a log app.

We always welcome your questions, suggestions, and comments. Contact us at support@whisperarts.com
descriptionShort: Track breastfeeding, pumping & milk stash. Note baby feedings, sleep, milestones

title: Erby baby tracker for newborns & nursing mom log

creator: Whisper Arts - free apps for parenting
descriptionHtml:
Erby helps you easily track and record breastfeeding, newborn activity, sleep statistics. It's also a handy food diary for your baby and nursing mom!

You will be able to make sure that the newborn is getting enough breast milk and to establish the daily baby care. Enter information about food, beverages, medications and supplements you are taking. This will help identify allergic reactions in the infant.

LACTATION

Start the breastfeeding timer with one click! Track the duration of feedings, easily remember which breast you fed the last time: this will help to establish breastfeeding and avoid lactostasis. Record data on pumping and responses to the first complementary foods.

PUMPING

Consider the volume of expressed milk with the option to start the feeding timer separately for each breast or both at the same time.
Keep records of frozen milk - make sure you have enough stocks in your milk stash

SLEEP

Use a sleep tracker and note down when your child is asleep and awake. Record night and day sleep to understand baby's sleep and wake patterns

DIAPERS

Schedule your diaper change so you know how many diapers you need. Write urination (with volume as needed) and bowel movements separately

HEALTH, FEEDING

Mark various symptoms and temperature, enter data on vitamins, medicines and vaccination.
Record complementary feeding data and track the baby's response. Monitor your baby's weight gain and growth. Watch for teething. Erby is great for visiting a pediatrician.

ACTIVITIES

Record bathing and walking, tummy time, games, massage.

STATISTICS AND HISTORY

View event statistics so you can spot trends and, if necessary, make adjustments to your baby's care. Study your daily routine. A complete history of events, the ability to filter them by type (for example, only walks or pump log) is always at your fingertips.

REMINDERS
Set reminders for the events you need. You will not miss your medication and will not forget to feed or put your child to bed at the right time.

Erby is not just a baby development journal, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one year old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

We are always glad to receive your questions, suggestions and comments. Email us at support@whisperarts.com
descriptionShort: Track feedings, pumping & milk stash. Note newborn sleep, milestones, diaper

title: Baby feeding & growth tracker

creator: Whisper Arts
descriptionHtml:
Baby tracker Erby helps you easily track and record breastfeeding, pumping, newborn activity, sleep statistics. It's also a handy food diary for your baby and nursing mom!

You will be able to make sure that the newborn is getting enough breast milk and to establish daily baby care. Enter information about food, beverages, medications, supplements you are taking. This will help identify allergic reactions in the infant.

BREASTFEEDING

Start the breastfeeding timer with one click! Track the duration of feedings, easily remember which breast you fed the last time: this will help to establish breastfeeding and avoid lactostasis. Record data on pumping and responses to the first complementary foods.
It is important for the growth and development of the newborn.


PUMPING

Consider the volume of expressed milk with the option to start the feeding timer separately for each breast or both at the same time.
Keep records of frozen milk - make sure you have enough stocks in your milk stash

SLEEP

Use a sleep tracker and note down when your child is asleep and awake. Record night and day sleep to understand baby's sleep and wake patterns.
Simple and convenient sleep timer

NAPPY

Schedule your nappy change so you know how many nappies you need. Write urination (with volume as needed) and bowel movements separately.
A nappy tracker will help keep your baby hydrated.

HEALTH, FEEDING

Mark various symptoms and baby temperature, enter data on vitamins, medicines, vaccination.
Record complementary feeding data and track the baby's response. Monitor your baby's weight gain and growth. Watch for teething. Erby is great for visiting a pediatrician.

ACTIVITIES

Record bathing and walking, tummy time, games, massage.

STATISTICS AND HISTORY

View event statistics so you can spot trends and, if necessary, make adjustments to your baby's care. Study your daily routine. A complete history of events, the ability to filter them by type (for example, only walks or pump log) is always at your fingertips.

REMINDERS
Set reminders for the events you need. You will not miss your medication and will not forget to feed or put your child to bed at the right time.

Erby is not just a baby development and feeding log, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one-year-old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

We are always glad to receive your questions, suggestions, comments. Email us at support@whisperarts.com
descriptionShort: Track feedings, pumping, nappy & sleep. Follow newborn development and growth

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- new widget Total today
- small improvements

We always welcome your questions, suggestions, and comments. Use the feedback form in the application or write to us at support@whisperarts.com

You will be able to make sure that the newborn is getting enough breast milk and to establish daily baby care. Enter information about food, beverages, medications, supplements you are taking. This will help identify allergic reactions in the infant.

BREASTFEEDING

Start the breastfeeding timer with one click! Track the duration of feedings, easily remember which breast you fed the last time: this will help to establish breastfeeding and avoid lactostasis. Record data on pumping and responses to the first complementary foods.
It is important for the growth and development of the newborn.


PUMPING

Consider the volume of expressed milk with the option to start the feeding timer separately for each breast or both at the same time.
Keep records of frozen milk - make sure you have enough stocks in your milk stash

SLEEP

Use a sleep tracker and note down when your child is asleep and awake. Record night and day sleep to understand baby's sleep and wake patterns.
Simple and convenient sleep timer

DIAPERS

Schedule your diaper change so you know how many diapers you need. Write urination (with volume as needed) and bowel movements separately.
Diapers tracker will help keep your baby hydrated.

HEALTH, FEEDING

Mark various symptoms and baby temperature, enter data on vitamins, medicines, vaccination.
Record complementary feeding data and track the baby's response. Monitor your baby's weight gain and growth. Watch for teething. Erby is great for visiting a pediatrician.

ACTIVITIES

Record bathing and walking, tummy time, games, massage.

STATISTICS AND HISTORY

View event statistics so you can spot trends and, if necessary, make adjustments to your baby's care. Study your daily routine. A complete history of events, the ability to filter them by type (for example, only walks or pump log) is always at your fingertips.

REMINDERS
Set reminders for the events you need. You will not miss your medication and will not forget to feed or put your child to bed at the right time.

Erby is not just a baby development and feeding log, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one-year-old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

We are always glad to receive your questions, suggestions, comments. Email us at support@whisperarts.com
descriptionShort: Newborn log: breastfeeding, pumping, diapers, sleep. Follow child development

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- minor improvements

We always welcome your questions, suggestions, and comments. Use the feedback form in the application, or write to us at support@whisperarts.com

creator: Whisper Arts
descriptionHtml:
Baby tracker Erby helps you easily track and record breastfeeding, pumping, newborn activity, sleep statistics. It's also a handy food diary for your baby and nursing mom!

You will be able to make sure that the newborn is getting enough breast milk and to establish daily baby care. Enter information about food, beverages, medications, supplements you are taking. This will help identify allergic reactions in the infant.

BREASTFEEDING

Start the breastfeeding timer with one click! Track the duration of feedings, easily remember which breast you fed the last time: this will help to establish breastfeeding and avoid lactostasis. Record data on pumping and responses to the first complementary foods.
It is important for the growth and development of the newborn.


PUMPING

Consider the volume of expressed milk with the option to start the feeding timer separately for each breast or both at the same time.
Keep records of frozen milk - make sure you have enough stocks in your milk stash

SLEEP

Use a sleep tracker and note down when your child is asleep and awake. Record night and day sleep to understand baby's sleep and wake patterns.
Simple and convenient sleep timer

NAPPY

Schedule your nappy change so you know how many nappies you need. Write urination (with volume as needed) and bowel movements separately.
A nappy tracker will help keep your baby hydrated.

HEALTH, FEEDING

Mark various symptoms and baby temperature, enter data on vitamins, medicines, vaccination.
Record complementary feeding data and track the baby's response. Monitor your baby's weight gain and growth. Watch for teething. Erby is great for visiting a pediatrician.

ACTIVITIES

Record bathing and walking, tummy time, games, massage.

STATISTICS AND HISTORY

View event statistics so you can spot trends and, if necessary, make adjustments to your baby's care. Study your daily routine. A complete history of events, the ability to filter them by type (for example, only walks or pump log) is always at your fingertips.

REMINDERS
Set reminders for the events you need. You will not miss your medication and will not forget to feed or put your child to bed at the right time.

Erby is not just a baby development and feeding log, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one-year old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

We are always glad to receive your questions, suggestions, comments. Email us at support@whisperarts.com

Restore and sync recordings across multiple devices;

Daily routine for all time;

Export data to Excel for analysis and printing;
Teeth records;
No ads.

Breastfeeding tracker Erby is not just a baby development and feeding log, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one-year-old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

title: Baby feeding & growth tracker

creator: Whisper Arts
descriptionHtml:
Baby tracker Erby helps you easily track and record breastfeeding, pumping, newborn activity, sleep statistics. It's also a handy food diary for your baby and nursing mom!

You will be able to make sure that the newborn is getting enough breast milk and to establish daily baby care. Enter information about food, beverages, medications, supplements you are taking. This will help identify allergic reactions in the infant.

BREASTFEEDING

Start the breastfeeding timer with one click! Track the duration of feedings, easily remember which breast you fed the last time: this will help to establish breastfeeding and avoid lactostasis. Record data on pumping and responses to the first complementary foods.
It is important for the growth and development of the newborn.


PUMPING

Consider the volume of expressed milk with the option to start the feeding timer separately for each breast or both at the same time.
Keep records of frozen milk - make sure you have enough stocks in your milk stash

SLEEP

Use a sleep tracker and note down when your child is asleep and awake. Record night and day sleep to understand baby's sleep and wake patterns.
Simple and convenient sleep timer

NAPPY

Schedule your nappy change so you know how many nappies you need. Write urination (with volume as needed) and bowel movements separately.
A nappy tracker will help keep your baby hydrated.

HEALTH, FEEDING

Mark various symptoms and baby temperature, enter data on vitamins, medicines, vaccination.
Record complementary feeding data and track the baby's response. Monitor your baby's weight gain and growth. Watch for teething. Erby is great for visiting a pediatrician.

ACTIVITIES

Record bathing and walking, tummy time, games, massage.

STATISTICS AND HISTORY

View event statistics so you can spot trends and, if necessary, make adjustments to your baby's care. Study your daily routine. A complete history of events, the ability to filter them by type (for example, only walks or pump log) is always at your fingertips.

REMINDERS
Set reminders for the events you need. You will not miss your medication and will not forget to feed or put your child to bed at the right time.

PREMIUM VERSION

The Premium version has the full functionality of the application:

Restore and sync recordings across multiple devices;
Reminders for the exact date and time, the ability to turn off recurring reminders at night;
Full access to statistics;
Daily routine for all time;
Customizable widgets on the main page of the application;
Export data to Excel for analysis and printing;
Teeth records;
No ads.

Erby is not just a baby development and feeding log, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one-year old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

We are always glad to receive your questions, suggestions, comments. Email us at support@whisperarts.com

title:
Baby feeding & growth tracker
4.16.1

creator: Demapps LLC
descriptionHtml:
Baby tracker Erby helps you easily track and record breastfeeding, pumping, newborn activity, sleep statistics. It's also a handy food diary for your baby and nursing mom!

You will be able to make sure that the newborn is getting enough breast milk and to establish daily baby care. Enter information about food, beverages, medications, supplements you are taking. This will help identify allergic reactions in the infant.

BREASTFEEDING

Start the breastfeeding timer with one click! Track the duration of feedings, easily remember which breast you fed the last time: this will help to establish breastfeeding and avoid lactostasis. Record data on pumping and responses to the first complementary foods.
It is important for the growth and development of the newborn.


PUMPING

Consider the volume of expressed milk with the option to start the feeding timer separately for each breast or both at the same time.
Keep records of frozen milk - make sure you have enough stocks in your milk stash

SLEEP

Use a sleep tracker and note down when your child is asleep and awake. Record night and day sleep to understand baby's sleep and wake patterns.
Simple and convenient sleep timer

NAPPY

Schedule your nappy change so you know how many nappies you need. Write urination (with volume as needed) and bowel movements separately.
A nappy tracker will help keep your baby hydrated.

HEALTH, FEEDING

Mark various symptoms and baby temperature, enter data on vitamins, medicines, vaccination.
Record complementary feeding data and track the baby's response. Monitor your baby's weight gain and growth. Watch for teething. Erby is great for visiting a pediatrician.

ACTIVITIES

Record bathing and walking, tummy time, games, massage.

STATISTICS AND HISTORY

View event statistics so you can spot trends and, if necessary, make adjustments to your baby's care. Study your daily routine. A complete history of events, the ability to filter them by type (for example, only walks or pump log) is always at your fingertips.

REMINDERS
Set reminders for the events you need. You will not miss your medication and will not forget to feed or put your child to bed at the right time.

PREMIUM VERSION

The Premium version has the full functionality of the application:

Restore and sync recordings across multiple devices;
Reminders for the exact date and time, the ability to turn off recurring reminders at night;
Full access to statistics;
Daily routine for all time;
Customizable widgets on the main page of the application;
Export data to Excel for analysis and printing;
Teeth records;
No ads.

Erby is not just a baby development and feeding log, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one-year old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

We are always glad to receive your questions, suggestions, comments. Email us at support@whisperarts.com
descriptionShort: Newborn tracker: breastfeeding, nappy, pumping log, baby sleep and development

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- minor improvements

We always welcome your questions, suggestions, and comments. Use the feedback form in the application, or write to us at support@whisperarts.com

title:
Baby feeding & growth tracker
5.6.0

creator: Demapps LLC
descriptionHtml:
Baby tracker Erby helps you easily track and record breastfeeding, pumping, newborn activity, sleep statistics. It's also a handy food diary for your baby and nursing mom!

You will be able to make sure that the newborn is getting enough breast milk and to establish daily baby care. Enter information about food, beverages, medications, supplements you are taking. This will help identify allergic reactions in the infant.

BREASTFEEDING

Start the breastfeeding timer with one click! Track the duration of feedings, easily remember which breast you fed the last time: this will help to establish breastfeeding and avoid lactostasis. Record data on pumping and responses to the first complementary foods.
It is important for the growth and development of the newborn.


PUMPING

Consider the volume of expressed milk with the option to start the feeding timer separately for each breast or both at the same time.
Keep records of frozen milk - make sure you have enough stocks in your milk stash

SLEEP

Use a sleep tracker and note down when your child is asleep and awake. Record night and day sleep to understand baby's sleep and wake patterns.
Simple and convenient sleep timer

NAPPY

Schedule your nappy change so you know how many nappies you need. Write urination (with volume as needed) and bowel movements separately.
A nappy tracker will help keep your baby hydrated.

HEALTH, FEEDING

Mark various symptoms and baby temperature, enter data on vitamins, medicines, vaccination.
Record complementary feeding data and track the baby's response. Monitor your baby's weight gain and growth. Watch for teething. Erby is great for visiting a pediatrician.

ACTIVITIES

Record bathing and walking, tummy time, games, massage.

STATISTICS AND HISTORY

View event statistics so you can spot trends and, if necessary, make adjustments to your baby's care. Study your daily routine. A complete history of events, the ability to filter them by type (for example, only walks or pump log) is always at your fingertips.

REMINDERS
Set reminders for the events you need. You will not miss your medication and will not forget to feed or put your child to bed at the right time.

PREMIUM VERSION

The Premium version has the full functionality of the application:

Restore and sync recordings across multiple devices;
Reminders for the exact date and time, the ability to turn off recurring reminders at night;
Full access to statistics;
Daily routine for all time;
Customizable widgets on the main page of the application;
Export data to Excel for analysis and printing;
Teeth records;
No ads.

Erby is not just a baby development and feeding log, it is a memory of your precious first months with him.

You can keep a diary for multiple children. Suitable for twins!

Our breast feeding app was created to help even the most sleep-deprived parents keep track of their baby's progress up to one-year old by recording daily activities and feeding statistics in this easy-to-use diary.

We are always glad to receive your questions, suggestions, comments. Email us at support@whisperarts.com
descriptionShort: Newborn tracker: breastfeeding, nappy, pumping log, baby sleep and development

- fixed the bug with black screen and application freezing;
- fixed the bug with real-time timer synchronization.

We always welcome your questions, suggestions, and comments. Use the feedback form in the application, or write to us at support@whisperarts.com
